title: 94/64/EC: Commission Decision of 1 February 1994 amending Decision 93/663/EC concerning the specific financial contribution by the Community towards the eradication of foot-and-mouth disease in Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 1 February 1994 amending Decision 93/663/EC concerning the specific financial contribution by the Community towards the eradication of foot-and-mouth disease in Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic) (94/64/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 93/663/EC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 1 (c) 'Article 3.3' shall be replaced by 'Article 3'.
2. Article 2 (3) shall be deleted.
3. Article 3 (1) and (2) shall be deleted.
4. In Article 3, paragraph 3, shall be numbered paragraph 1 and '30 November' shall be replaced by '31 December'.
This Decision is addressed to Italy.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 February 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
